participant_1.name: Mark Thompson
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and enthusiastic about music, especially classic rock.
participant_1.background: i just bought a house recently. i'm married with two kids. i see the rolling stones in concert every year. i'm an economics major. i eat a raw diet.

participant_2.name: Amina Hussein
participant_2.personality: Resilient and passionate about dance, with a rich cultural background.
participant_2.background: now i live in the united states. my aunt helped me escape when i was of. i was born in somalia. i was forced to marry when i was a. i like to dance.

content.text: yup   do you like the rolling stones
